overview: Take a walk on the wild side with the raunchy residents of Twin Hills as they discover the truth of lusty Laura's disappearance. State trooper Palmer quickly finds there's more than meets the eye when he uncovers the sinful secrets of a strange town and its even stranger inhabitants. His search for the missing girl leads him through a series of bizarre encounters with gorgeous women, odd men, and everything in-between! Prepare to be amazed!
tagline: Take A Walk On The Wild Side. . .
title: Strange Behavior
